name: Pizza Lad
description:
Esc to fullscreen.

If you're having audio issues, please use the downloadable builds

You play as Pizza Lad. Pizza Lad delivers pizzas to his friends until he runs out of pizza. Pizza Lad is very happy, but there's a lot of weird stuff going on outside, so getting to his destination isn't always easy. But Pizza Lad keeps delivering pizzas to them because Pizza Lad loves his friends very much, even though they don't talk all that much anymore, and never close their front door, and don't really move either...

 You know, I think Pizza Lad might not be a very sane and stable lad.

wasd or arrow keys to move

space, enter, or left click to punch

(once Pizza Lad runs out of pizzas, there won't be a countdown in his home anymore. So no countdown = you win, yay!)

Programming: TheDerpie

Art: ASillyVole

Music/Sfx: Osun (https://www.youtube.com/osun6)
